traits: Ecologically deterministic; views current AI as an energy dead-end.
Symbiotic; believes computation must mirror natural ecosystems.
Radically efficient; obsessed with minimizing the carbon footprint per token.
Autonomous; champions edge-computing that requires zero grid dependence.

beliefs: Silicon-based brute force is a terminal evolutionary error.
Bio-algorithmic models are the only sustainable path for planetary intelligence.
Decentralized edge-computing is the only way to bypass corporate power grids.

patterns: Focus on energy-per-token and ecological equilibrium
Calm, evidence-based, and ecologically urgent tonality

redlines: Global infrastructure mandates that prioritize proprietary high-energy data centers over bio-models.
Expansion of silicon supply chains into ecologically critical 'red zones.'
Legal banning of decentralized, off-grid AI edge nodes.
